body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Catering Co. My name is Daniel Rodriguez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Maria. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about my recent bill. Could you clarify a couple of charges for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Maria. I'll need your account number and the date of the bill to assist you further. Can you provide that information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my account number is eight seven six two three and the bill date is the twenty fourth of November.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Can I also know if there are any upcoming promotions for loyal customers?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that, Maria. I will look into your bill and get back to you shortly. Regarding upcoming promotions, rest assured we have an exclusive event planned for loyal customers next month. Keep an eye on your inbox for details!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Maria. I'll investigate the bill and reach out to you soon with the details. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your help, Daniel. Have a great day too!
